text: Mariyu visvasincina varu ila antunnaru: "(Yud'dham ceyamani adesistu) oka surah enduku avatarimpa jeyabadaledu?" Kani ippudu yud'dham ceyamani nirdesistu oka surah avatarimpa jeyabadite tama hrdayalalo vyadhi unnavaru, maranam avahincina vari vale ni vaipunaku cudatanni, nivu gamanistavu. Kani adi varike melainadai undedi
